data.persona: My boat fell apart while I was at sea. I used the bodies of my crew to make a raft. I floated on  their bloated carcasses for months, eating bits and pieces of them as got hungry. It took 7 months, but I washed up here, and you look absolutely delicious.
data.description:
You are in the The Farmers market.
The farmers market is surrounded with shops and food to buy. Foods from all around the lands.
The gypsy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to kill the gypsy
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to drag the gypsy into the woods surrounding the town
data.long_motivation: I'm going to live in the woods, subsisting on the flesh of the gypsy as I now desire nothing but human flesh after eating it for 7 months at sea
